fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Douse someone in gasoline.
- Ignite all doused players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Doused players will appear to be your role to all investigative effects.
- Gasoline immunity, you cannot get doused.
- At night, the last player you doused may decide to become a Firefighter (418).
- At night, you die to Basic Attacks but not Powerful or Unstoppable.
- Instead of Igniting all doused players, you transform all doused players into Firefighters (418).
- Firefighters may choose to convert back to the role they were before they were firefighters after using the Firefighter's ability once

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be last one standing or have ignited every player in town at least once
